text:
Well, -a means “authenticated” right?
The docs says clear that you are not able to use non auth validator and auth validator. They are incompatible. 

From docs: you need to deploy a new validator with auth enabled. And destroy old validator

elements.text:
Well, -a means “authenticated” right?
The docs says clear that you are not able to use non auth validator and auth validator. They are incompatible.
From docs: you need to deploy a new validator with auth enabled. And destroy old validator

text: Well first, i destroyed the old validator then i deployed the new validator

elements.text: Well first, i destroyed the old validator then i deployed the new validator

text: <@U03HMUTQ5F0> :wave:

Hi~
I’m experiencing the exact same problem, but for me, the `participant-2` container is stuck in a constant restart loop.
I’ve already tried the re-onboarding process with the `-i` (identities dump) and `-P` (new participant id) options, but the issue persists.
Have you found any solution or workaround for this?
